title.rendered: How long do you have to Claim your Tax Refund?

content.rendered: The IRS reported more than a billion dollars’ worth of unclaimed tax refunds last tax season. Optima CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang remind taxpayers that they have up to three years to claim their tax refunds with the IRS and review how they can receive the assets that are owed to them.
